Text: Thanks, I prefer XViD because it can run on XBMC but i understand that x264 is better quality. Thanks for the seeding this.

I usually use Boxee, which is based on XBMC, on my HTPC and it can play x264 just fine. 

Also, can XBMC play .mkv files? I created Matroska files since they allow you to have chapter markers. This way you can jump between the skits.
